body_html: @RuofanKong When the operation runs in worker's GPU, the worker needs to fetch the variables from the PS by network. It is slower than the operation runs in PS because the variables are stored in PS. Maybe you can use the tcpdump to catch the data in network to prove what I guess.

body: @RuofanKong When the operation runs in worker's GPU, the worker needs to fetch the variables from the PS by network. It is slower than the operation runs in PS because  the variables are stored in  PS. Maybe you can use the tcpdump to catch the data in network to prove what I guess.
